effect.name: Alpha Fish (Texture)
effect.description: This shader renders a stylized fish-like figure using procedural shapes and color blending, with customizable visibility and texture mixing. It combines multiple geometric elements like circles and gradients to create a layered fish silhouette with highlights and shadows.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
